title: The 20 Best Lingerie Brands to Take a Spot in Your Top Drawer
‘It’s game over for facts’: how vibes came to rule everything from pop to politics
description: From voters picking up ‘bad vibes’ to the Brat girl summer, vague instincts now make the world go round. Does this represent a crisis of seriousness or has it always been feelings that make us human? Facts were cool for about 250 years. From the Enlightenment until this century, facts were where it was at. They had a good innings. But it is game over for facts, the end of the line for statistics. These days, what counts is what you feel. In other words, it’s all about the vibe.Vibes are everywhere. Disillusioned Labour voters are “picking up bad vibes”, reports this paper. The Bank of England gets “wrong-footed by a vibe shift in the economy”. In the US, a “vibe-cession” – a downturn in economic confidence at an impressionistic level – was a key electoral issue. Google Maps will not only give you directions, but “vibe check” a neighbourhood for you. Of all this year’s hit albums, the one that had a vibe named after it – Brat – won the culture, catapulting Charli XCX to seven Grammy nominations. When a new production of Romeo & Juliet opened on Broadway recently, a US newspaper wrote that “the vibe is very ‘teens hanging out in the Target parking lot’, only with a lot more sonnets and glitter” – because even William Shakespeare is no one without a vibe these days. Continue reading...
author: Jess Cartner-Morley

title: Help! It’s a style crisis: handbag essentials fashionistas never leave home without
description: From a shoe spray to a debobbler to the elastic band style fix, we ask the fashion set for the handbag necessities guaranteed to save the daySo, you’ve got your outfit all set – and it is looking good – but what about your fashion first aid kit? Those little hero items that come to the rescue should sartorial disaster strike. We all know how one accidental splosh of red wine can ruin a look, after all.To give us a helping hand on a night out, we’ve asked a bunch of fashionable people who always look well put together to share the secret weapon in their handbag. For some, it is about the basics but essentials: a sewing kit (photographer and model Laura Bailey’s must-have), a toothpick or elastic bands (stylist Peter Bevan explains how they are key to achieving the perfect rolled-up shirt sleeve). For others, it’s a proper piece of kit, such as a debobbler, a defuzzer or an on-the-go tailoring tool. Continue reading...
author: Guardian Staff

title: Still Time to Shop: 28 Under-$100 FP Movement Gifts To Give (Or Get!)
description: This holiday season, we’ve found the gifts that feel great to get and even better to give. Shop Well-Received, our collection of editor-approved holiday gift guides, here.Scrambling to secure a few more holiday gifts? We — and FP Movement — got you. The reader-favorite label is more than a one-stop wonder for all the fitness buffs and cozy connoisseurs in your life. Orders placed by December 18, 11:59 pm PT, will, indeed, arrive by December 24. Since time is of the essence, we’ve culled a gift edit full of athleisure essentials, lounge styles, and active accessories (all priced under $100). Whether it’s a sweet pair of $18 socks, a vibrant $30 bag, or a deliciously cozy $98 fleece, we’re sure those remaining on your list will be ecstatic to unwrap any of these Free People finds. (Pro tip: A FP Movement gift card always delights.) Peruse the best under-$100 gifts from Free People ahead.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.FP Movement Hit The Slopes BalaclavaThe snowboarder or skier in your life will love this fleece balaclava to stylishly protect them from harsh winter elements.FP Movement Hit The Slopes Balaclava, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Quilted Carryall Bag This oversized bag is one of FP Movement’s most popular products. It’s beloved by Refinery29 editors, too, as a versatile and spacious carry-all you can tote around everywhere from the gym to work. Everyone on your list deserves one.FP Movement Quilted Carryall Bag, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Apres Ski Team Pom BeanieYour giftee needn't be an avid skier to appreciate this fashion-forward beanie. It’s a fun, cold-weather staple that’ll stand out from other wintry neutrals. FP Movement Apres Ski Team Pom Beanie, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Hot Shot OnesieA kitschy holiday onesie? Pass. Opt for a more versatile all-in-one your giftee will actually want to live in. This style from the fan-favorite Hot Shot collection has a 4.7-out-of-5 star rating from over 2.5K reviewers, many of whom say they own several of the 16 color options.FP Movement Hot Shot Onesie, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Never Better Foldover PantsRather than a pair of leggings (everyone has particular preferences), consider gifting a more versatile pair of pants. We’re loving these stretchy, buttery-soft flares with a foldover waistband that you can customize to your giftee's height. The red hue feels especially festive. FP Movement Never Better Foldover Pants, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement x Mayim 24oz Collapsible Carabiner BottleThis collapsible silicone reusable bottle from Mayim is an editor-favorite favorite travel companion. Now, it’s available in a handful of new colors exclusive to FP Movement — a great buy for those with long commutes or frequent flyers. They can hook it onto their bag by the built-in carabiner clip — genius.FP Movement x Mayim Exclusive 24oz Collapsible Carabiner Bottle, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Epic Mini BraThis one’s for the minimalists — sleek, supportive, and made to move.FP Movement Epic Mini Bra, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Good Karma Long Tank A bold red tank for serving all the good holiday vibes. Your giftee can rock it while stretching, lounging, or tackling a last-minute wrapping marathon.FP Movement Good Karma Long Tank, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Position Tunic LayerSecure this ribbed midi dress for the cozy queen in your life — they'll layer it, lounge in it, and travel in it. A serious win.FP Movement Position Tunic Layer, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Volley V-Neck Pullover Behold peak slouchy deliciousness (it nails the varsity aesthetic, too).FP Movement Volley V-Neck Pullover, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Never Better Bike ShortsThese biker shorts are the perfect pairing with the Volley V-Neck Pullover on top, don’t you think?FP Movement Never Better Bike Shorts, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement 28" Stirrup Legwarmers Winter is leg warmer season. We’re eyeing this sleek black pair — so cute with leggings in a dance class or styled with boots for a bold holiday look.  FP Movement 28" Stirrup Legwarmers, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Cool Down Beanie Keep your giftee cozy in frigid temps with this chunky, ribbed beanie. Fans of this top-rated style note how the fabric keeps their heads warm without roasting.FP Movement Movement Cool Down Beanie, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Never Better Long TankBusiness in the front, party in the back for the fitness queen on your list. It’s made from a sweat-wicking material with a built-in shelf bra for low-to-medium impact workouts, like Pilates.FP Movement Never Better Long Tank, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Quilted Mini Case What’s the best follow-up gift to the much-loved quilted carryall bag? An adorable mini version. Much like its larger counterpart, it comes in lots of colors to coordinate with any outfit.FP Movement Quilted Mini Case, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Mountain High 1/2 Zip FleeceFree People knows a thing or two about ultra-cozy styles, and this editor-favorite fleece pullover is a prime example. The relaxed half-zip can be worn on its own or layered up, and is great for outdoor winter activities and travel. Choosing this under-$100 gift is easy — picking a color will be harder. FP Movement Mountain High 1/2 Zip Fleece, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Quilted Duffle If your giftee already owns (and loves) the brand’s quilted carry-all, expand their puffy bag collection with the duffle version. It's the perfect carry-on or weekender bag for the stylish traveler in your life. FP Movement Quilted Duffle, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Carpe Diem ShortsRun clubs seemed to multiply in 2024. So, for the new (or avid) runner on your list, wrap up a pair of running shorts that are as stylish as they are functional. This fluttery pair (crafted from water-resistant fabric) has built-in briefs, an interior pocket, and a no-slip waistband. We're especially fond of this heritage green pair with throwback stripes that look so cool.FP Movement Champ Is Here Pants, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement x Yoga Design Lab Cork Yoga BlockWhether you know a master yogi or someone who’s new to downward dog, this biodegradable natural cork yoga block is a thoughtful, useful, and unexpectedly beautiful gift.  FP Movement x Yoga Design Lab Cork Yoga Block, $, available at Free PeopleFP Movement Hot Shot Tee RomperAnother one-and-done cozy outfit sure to please? title: Winter is Here, And Free People Has The New Arrivals To Prove It
description: We know our readers love a good Free People find. So do our editors, who are always more than thrilled to keep tabs on the best new products to shop from the retailer. While new releases can be overwhelming, we’re here to bring you the best-of-the-best options worth your attention — and coins.With winter weather in full swing, cue the cozy essentials (think coordinating lounge sets and cute cardigans), luxe statement pieces (slay winter dresses and sparkly jeans, please and thanks), and functional yet stylish accessories (if you’re not swathed in an oversized scarf, what are you doing?) Of course, FP faves like beanies, quilted carryalls, and ultra-soft pajamas — not to mention the highly coveted Free People x Yellowstone collection — are holding their own in our edit. Whether you’re refreshing your festive wardrobe or hunting for gifts with that signature Free People vibe, these new arrivals have you covered.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can’t-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Summer IntroWe know our readers love a good Free People find... as do our editors. We’re always more than happy to keep tabs on the best new Free People products to shop. While new releases can be overwhelming, we’re here to bring you the best-of-the-best options worth your attention and money.And now that summer is officially here, it’s a great time to take a deep dive into your closet to see what you need to re-stock. Do you need a new flowy dress? Maybe a new activewear set? What about a denim jacket for festival season? Free People has fresh styles that fit the bill.You’ll find many products coming from Free People’s fan-favorite collections like FP Movement, We The Free, and Free-est to suit any vibe you’re going for this summer. One look at these, and you'll get it — it’s all about the vibes.Free People Jackson Cozy Stripe Socks, $, available at Free PeopleHailee Sweater Set Live your best mocha mousse lounge life in this waffle-knit set.free-est Hailee Sweater Set, $, available at Free PeopleWinter Storm Tunic A perfect curl-up-by-the-fire, stroll-with-hot-cocoa, snuggle-under-a-blanket sweater situation.Free People Winter Storm Tunic, $, available at Free PeopleIn A Bubble Puffer Vest Just like your puffers and fleeces, this padded vest in delicious espresso is essential.FP Movement In A Bubble Puffer Vest, $, available at Free PeopleFlannel Play Date Set There’s idyllic, and then there’s this set — perfect for that holiday week off where time doesn’t exist and PJs are the only uniform.Intimately Flannel Play Date Set, $, available at Free PeopleWin Win Bra We can’t talk best Free People new arrivals without highlighting an FP Movement set. For real, it’s another mocha mousse must-have.FP Movement Win Win Bra, $, available at Free PeopleNever Better 7/8 Length Leggings Like the Carpe Diem Shorts, the matching leggings are another best-seller.FP Movement Never Better 7/8 Length Leggings, $, available at Free PeopleBe My Baby Long-Sleeve Tee The lettuce hems on this long-sleeve tee? title: The 27 Best Sneakers For Women - From Adidas Sambas to Hoka Trainers
description: Being comfortable in your own shoes never goes out of style, so investing in a top-tier sneaker collection is always a smart idea. When it comes to picking out the best sneakers, we look for a few key elements: good design, quality materials, and the perfect fit - because who wants to be uncomfortable? Our editors test out so many different types of shoes to provide you with the best product recommendations, and we boast a particular expertise on sneakers (call us sneakerheads, if you will). Love some casual, everyday sneakers? We've got you covered. Prefer sportier, performance sneakers for working out? We found those, too. And of course, if you're looking for cute sneakers that you can dress up for work, we've tried our fair share. To help you find the best women's sneakers to add to your wardrobe, we enlisted our expert editors, along with a handful of celebrities we've interviewed - like Kate Hudson, Ashley Graham, and Ayesha Curry - for their masterful recommendations of the best women's sneakers for 2024. These picks cover a range of styles, so you're bound to find your perfect shoe. What to Look For in the Best Women's Sneakers Whether you want something modern and playful or sleek and classic, we've uncovered the best of the best trending this year, and we'll tell you all the reasons we love these stylish sneakers. The styles fall into a number of different design categories, including: best trendy sneakers, best sustainable sneakers, best athletic sneakers, best high-top sneakers, best white sneakers, best classic sneakers, and best sneakers for walking. At the moment, fashion forecasters predict sporty dad sneakers will continue to be big throughout 2024 - particularly styles from brands like New Balance and Reebok. In an homage to the '90s and early aughts, chunky platform sneakers are also being embraced by stylists and celebrities alike - as showcased via New York Fashion Week street style. And the newly debuted Adidas Campus 00s are primed to be the season's hottest everyday sneaker this fall, thanks to its striped flair which offers an elevated take on the cult-favorite Adidas Sambas. Our own sneaker recommendations tout brands like Nike, Converse, Puma, and more. Word of advice: your shoe closet is about to get a whole lot fuller, so make some extra room. Keep reading to shop our guide to the best sneakers for women.
author: Kyley Warren

title: The 12 Bestselling Skims Pieces of All Time
description: Skims went from an idea to an award-winning intimates and loungewear brand. Founded by Kim Kardashian and Jens Grede in 2019, the company was valued at $4 billion in July 2023, according to Forbes. Whether or not shoppers are Kardashian fans, the brand still seems to have go-to collections that continuously sell out. And its Fifth Avenue flagship store was unveiled in NYC on Dec. 12 (right on the heels of its five-year anniversary) with a special presentation and celeb-packed party. The Skims Fits Everybody line is made with a signature stretch fabric that truly is butter-soft (in fact, I'm wearing the classic thong right now and I describe it as feeling like "nothing." In other words, it's a second skin). The Soft Lounge launch gave way to everyone's favorite long slip dress, which most people attest to be the most flattering body-conscious piece they own. And the Seamless Sculpt range provides every piece of shapewear you could possibly imagine layering underneath that slightly skin-revealing look you've been trying to figure out how to style. And then there's the nipple push-up bra that turns heads whenever I wear it and is a major bestseller. It should come as no surprise that you can now shop these pieces in person. Of course, Skims has been most notably praised for its sizing (XXS-4X) and incredible assortment of nude shades to complement skin tones. Its adaptive products feature added hook and eye closures and front clasps for accessibility, though the brand is overdue for introducing more styles. Nevertheless, if you're new to shopping Skims, we highly recommend you start with the top-rated picks that most folks rave about on social - and these 12 are it. Ahead, read up on the Skims bestsellers, and decide where to shop based on your color and size preferences. Skims is available online at skims.com, Nordstrom, Saks Fifth Avenue, Net-a-Porter, Ssense, and more.
author: Sarah Wasilak

title: Best Leather Hiking Boots: The 100 Year Old Boot That Baffled “Expert” Hikers
description: The Original Crazy One and His Epic Hike The Appalachian Trail is a 2,200-mile hike from Georgia to Maine or Maine to Georgia. Before 1948, completing a hike of the entire trail in one journey was not considered feasible. After 1948, it became a sport.
